name: Dean Daimon
description: Dean Daimon is a side scrolling action game. You control your bike and drive your way through hordes of enemies in order to reach your destination alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible Video card Storage: 60 MB available space
